p: There is a formalin-inactivated vaccine based on an NA-EEEV strain (PE-6) used in horses and emus, however it does not induce significant neutralizing anti-E2 antibody to SA-EEEV [ 63]. The vaccine is used in laboratory workers to protect from accidental exposure. A similar formalin-inactivated vaccine is available for horses. There is no specific therapy for EEE at the moment.
